channel.title: Help with server
channel.description: Hello everyone, I am brand new to this website and fairly new to RS servers. But none the less i am looking to host a runescape server in the same era as moparscape, the point of this server being just the nostalgia of the old runescape, starting as a noob in a new economy whereas other private or public servers have you jump straight to 126 and have everything you need. Now I'm not quite sure what I'm looking for would be labeled as (private or public), but I'm looking to set it up so that i can manually load the client onto the computer of the people whom want to play and be able to work over the internet without a domain if possible(Having the server computer broadcast via "No-ip" or something of the sorts). This is just going to be set up for me and friends in the small town I live in, I'm not sure what you can do to help on this website, but from what I have been reading it looks promising, if you have an earlier version of mopar or something i could use that would be great. Thanks -Josh PS. My bad, wrong place to post, where do i move this to?

item.title: Help with server
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Jarpye, post:3, topic:386859”]I’m sorry this is extremely noobish but how do i move it?

Also it won’t let me delete it…[/quote]just gotta wait for a mod to come around.

item.title: Help with server
item.dc:creator: @Jarpye Jarpye
item.description:
@Jarpye wrote:

Hello everyone, I am brand new to this website and fairly new to RS servers. But none the less i am looking to host a runescape server in the same era as moparscape, the point of this server being just the nostalgia of the old runescape, starting as a noob in a new economy whereas other private or public servers have you jump straight to 126 and have everything you need. Now I’m not quite sure what I’m looking for would be labeled as (private or public), but I’m looking to set it up so that i can manually load the client onto the computer of the people whom want to play and be able to work over the internet without a domain if possible(Having the server computer broadcast via “No-ip” or something of the sorts). This is just going to be set up for me and friends in the small town I live in, I’m not sure what you can do to help on this website, but from what I have been reading it looks promising, if you have an earlier version of mopar or something i could use that would be great. Thanks -Josh PS. My bad, wrong place to post, where do i move this to?
